inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: audiogram performed as standard of care for evaluation and management of chronic tinnitus
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

notes: A 42-year-old healthy woman came to the clinic to have her flu shot in early October. She works in a rehab center and has no underlying disease.
